text: Bohdan Ben (Богдан Бень) is a Ukrainian political scientist, based in Lviv. Ben is an author of multiple articles published in Ukrainian English-language newspapers Kyiv PostKyiv Post. About Bohdan Ben and Euromaidan Press.Euromaidan Press. About Bohdan Ben ==Research== Bohdan Ben has received a bachelor's degree in political science from National University of Kyiv- Mohyla Academy.
